name: Mechaniclock
description:
A game where the mechanics change as you play!

What do you do now? Shoot them!

Now? Avoid them speeding through space!

Now? Dance Dance DANCE!

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to look
  • Space to perform an action specific to each type!

Here's a little help with the modes if you're feeling stuck

Bullet - Gain score through shooting the others, avoid their shots, space to fire

Shepard - Gain score by pushing others to the sub-circles, space to make them lock to your rotation and push them in the direction you want them to move

Line - Gain score by making a line in front of an other, space to make a line

Gravity - Gain score by shifting the gravity whilst avoiding the others speeding because of it, space to shift gravity

Monster - Gain score by making monsters eat others, also don't let them eat you..; space to spawn an other in front of you

Dance - Get as close as you can to as many others as you can for pointspointspoints, space to bring others closer to you
